painPoints.title: Budget Pressure from Cost Savings Initiative
painPoints.description: BT is targeting GBP 3 billion in cost savings by end of decade, creating intense scrutiny on all vendor spending. Need to demonstrate ROI and position as cost reduction enabler.

painPoints.title: B2B Revenue Decline for Nine Years
painPoints.description: Enterprise division has experienced consistent revenue decline. New CEO Jon James tasked with turnaround, creating opportunity to position CloudSense as key enabler.

painPoints.title: System Complexity - 2,400 Systems to Rationalize
painPoints.description: BT has 2,400 systems with target to reduce to 500. Platform consolidation is strategic priority. CloudSense must reinforce position as Salesforce-native consolidation tool.

opportunities.title: B2B Turnaround Expansion
opportunities.description: Support Jon James' B2B turnaround with expanded CPQ capabilities for enterprise segment growth. Align with first revenue growth in nine years.

opportunities.title: Enterprise Quote Complexity Features
opportunities.description: Multi-site, multi-service quote capabilities for complex enterprise bundles. BT expanding network services (5G, full fibre) requiring sophisticated CPQ.

opportunities.title: Partner Channel Enablement
opportunities.description: CloudSense Anywhere for channel partners to support BT's partner ecosystem sales. Aligns with B2B growth strategy.
